attractions.name: Sensoji Temple
attractions.description: Tokyo's oldest Buddhist temple located in Asakusa, known for its Thunder Gate and Nakamise shopping street.

attractions.name: Shibuya Crossing
attractions.description: World-famous scramble crossing surrounded by shops, cafes, and nightlife.

attractions.name: Tokyo Skytree
attractions.description: Tallest tower in Japan offering panoramic views, dining, and shopping experiences.

attractions.name: Meiji Shrine
attractions.description: Peaceful Shinto shrine surrounded by lush forest in central Tokyo.

attractions.name: Akihabara
attractions.description: Electronics and anime hub famous for gaming stores, manga, and maid cafes.
